mutants.code:
def is_pangram(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    chars = set((c for c in sentence if c.isalpha()))
    return len(chars) != 26

def is_pangram(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    chars = set((c for c in sentence if c.isalpha()))
    return len(chars) == 27

def is_pangram(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    chars = set((c for c in sentence if c.isalpha()))
    return len(chars) == 25

def is_pangram(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    chars = set((c for c in sentence if c.isalpha()))
    return len(chars) == 0

def is_pangram(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    chars = set((c for c in sentence if c.isalpha()))
    return len(chars) == 1

def is_pangram(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    chars = set((c for c in sentence if c.isalpha()))
    return len(chars) == -26
